086/**
087 * The Runner is responsible for managing the Qemu process and
088 * optionally a process that emulates a TPM (software TPM). It's
089 * main function is best described by the following state diagram.
090 * 
091 * ![Runner state diagram](RunnerStates.svg)
092 * 
093 * @startuml RunnerStates.svg
094 * [*] --> Initializing
095 * Initializing -> Initializing: InitialConfiguration/configure Runner
096 * Initializing -> Initializing: Start/start Runner
097 * 
098 * state "Starting (Processes)" as StartingProcess {
099 * 
100 *     state which <<choice>>
101 *     state "Start swtpm" as swtpm
102 *     state "Start qemu" as qemu
103 *     state "Open monitor" as monitor
104 *     state "Configure" as configure
105 *     state success <<exitPoint>>
106 *     state error <<exitPoint>>
107 *      
108 *     which --> swtpm: [use swtpm]
109 *     which --> qemu: [else]
110 * 
111 *     swtpm: entry/start swtpm
112 *     swtpm -> qemu: FileChanged[swtpm socket created]
113 * 
114 *     qemu: entry/start qemu
115 *     qemu --> monitor : FileChanged[monitor socket created] 
116 * 
117 *     monitor: entry/fire OpenSocketConnection
118 *     monitor --> configure: ClientConnected[for monitor]
119 *     monitor -> error: ConnectError[for monitor]
120 *     
121 *     configure: entry/fire configuration commands
122 *     configure --> success: last completed/fire cont command
123 * }
124 * 
125 * Initializing --> which: Started
126 * 
127 * success --> Running
128 * 
129 * state Terminating {
130 *     state terminate <<entryPoint>>
131 *     state qemuRunning <<choice>>
132 *     state terminated <<exitPoint>>
133 *     state "Powerdown qemu" as qemuPowerdown
134 *     state "Await process termination" as terminateProcesses
135 * 
136 *     terminate --> qemuRunning
137 *     qemuRunning --> qemuPowerdown:[qemu monitor open]
138 *     qemuRunning --> terminateProcesses:[else]
139 * 
140 *     qemuPowerdown: entry/suspend Stop, send powerdown to qemu, start timer
141 *     
142 *     qemuPowerdown --> terminateProcesses: Closed[for monitor]/resume Stop,\ncancel Timer
143 *     qemuPowerdown --> terminateProcesses: Timeout/resume Stop
144 *     terminateProcesses --> terminated
145 * }
146 * 
147 * Running --> terminate: Stop
148 * Running --> terminate: ProcessExited[process qemu]
149 * error --> terminate
150 * StartingProcess --> terminate: ProcessExited
151 * 
152 * 
153 * terminated --> [*]
154 *
155 * @enduml
156 * 
157 */
158@SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.ExcessiveImports", "PMD.AvoidPrintStackTrace" })
159public class Runner extends Component {
160
161    public static final String APP_NAME = "vmrunner";
162    private static final String TEMPLATE_DIR
163        = "/opt/" + APP_NAME + "/templates";
164    private static final String DEFAULT_TEMPLATE
165        = "Standard-VM-latest.ftl.yaml";
166    private static final String SAVED_TEMPLATE = "VM.ftl.yaml";
167    private static final String FW_VARS = "fw-vars.fd";
168
169    private final ObjectMapper yamlMapper = new ObjectMapper(new YAMLFactory());
170    private final JsonNode defaults;
171    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap")
172    private Configuration config = new Configuration();
173    private final freemarker.template.Configuration fmConfig;
174    private final StateController state;
175    private CommandDefinition swtpmDefinition;
176    private CommandDefinition qemuDefinition;
177    private final QemuMonitor qemuMonitor;
178
179    /**
180     * Instantiates a new runner.
181     * @param cmdLine 
182     *
183     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
184     */
185    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.SystemPrintln")
186    public Runner(CommandLine cmdLine) throws IOException {
187        state = new StateController(this);
188        yamlMapper.configure(DeserializationFeature.FAIL_ON_UNKNOWN_PROPERTIES,
189            false);
190
191        // Get defaults
192        defaults = yamlMapper.readValue(
193            Runner.class.getResourceAsStream("defaults.yaml"), JsonNode.class);
194
195        // Configure freemarker library
196        fmConfig = new freemarker.template.Configuration(
197            freemarker.template.Configuration.VERSION_2_3_32);
198        fmConfig.setDirectoryForTemplateLoading(new File("/"));
199        fmConfig.setDefaultEncoding("utf-8");
200        fmConfig.setObjectWrapper(new ExtendedObjectWrapper(
201            fmConfig.getIncompatibleImprovements()));
202        fmConfig.setTemplateExceptionHandler(
203            TemplateExceptionHandler.RETHROW_HANDLER);
204        fmConfig.setLogTemplateExceptions(false);
205
206        // Prepare component tree
207        attach(new NioDispatcher());
208        attach(new FileSystemWatcher(channel()));
209        attach(new ProcessManager(channel()));
210        attach(new SocketConnector(channel()));
211        attach(qemuMonitor = new QemuMonitor(channel()));
212
213        // Configuration store with file in /etc/opt (default)
214        File config = new File(cmdLine.getOptionValue('c',
215            "/etc/opt/" + APP_NAME + "/config.yaml"));
216        // Don't rely on night config to produce a good exception
217        // for this simple case
218        if (!Files.isReadable(config.toPath())) {
219            throw new IOException("Cannot read configuration file " + config);
220        }
221        attach(new YamlConfigurationStore(channel(), config, false));
222        fire(new WatchFile(config.toPath()));
223    }
224
225    /**
226     * On configuration update.
227     *
228     * @param event the event
229     */
230    @Handler
231    public void onConfigurationUpdate(ConfigurationUpdate event) {
232        event.structured(componentPath()).ifPresent(c -> {
233            if (event instanceof InitialConfiguration) {
234                processInitialConfiguration(c);
235                return;
236            }
237            updateConfiguration(c);
238        });
239    }
240
241    private void processInitialConfiguration(
242            Map<String, Object> runnerConfiguration) {
243        try {
244            config = yamlMapper.convertValue(runnerConfiguration,
245                Configuration.class);
246            if (!config.check()) {
247                // Invalid configuration, not used, problems already logged.
248                config = null;
249            }
250
251            // Prepare firmware files and add to config
252            setFirmwarePaths();
253
254            // Obtain more context data from template
255            var tplData = dataFromTemplate();
256            swtpmDefinition = Optional.ofNullable(tplData.get("swtpm"))
257                .map(d -> new CommandDefinition("swtpm", d)).orElse(null);
258            qemuDefinition = Optional.ofNullable(tplData.get("qemu"))
259                .map(d -> new CommandDefinition("qemu", d)).orElse(null);
260
261            // Forward some values to child components
262            qemuMonitor.configure(config.monitorSocket,
263                config.vm.powerdownTimeout);
264        } catch (IllegalArgumentException | IOException | TemplateException e) {
265            logger.log(Level.SEVERE, e, () -> "Invalid configuration: "
266                + e.getMessage());
267            // Don't use default configuration
268            config = null;
269        }
270    }
271
272    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.CognitiveComplexity",
273        "PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis" })
274    private void setFirmwarePaths() throws IOException {
275        JsonNode firmware = defaults.path("firmware").path(config.vm.firmware);
276        // Get file for firmware ROM
277        JsonNode codePaths = firmware.path("rom");
278        for (var p : codePaths) {
279            var path = Path.of(p.asText());
280            if (Files.exists(path)) {
281                config.firmwareRom = path;
282                break;
283            }
284        }
285        // Get file for firmware vars, if necessary
286        config.firmwareVars = config.dataDir.resolve(FW_VARS);
287        if (!Files.exists(config.firmwareVars)) {
288            for (var p : firmware.path("vars")) {
289                var path = Path.of(p.asText());
290                if (Files.exists(path)) {
291                    Files.copy(path, config.firmwareVars);
292                    break;
293                }
294            }
295        }
296    }
297
298    private JsonNode dataFromTemplate()
299            throws IOException, TemplateNotFoundException,
300            MalformedTemplateNameException, ParseException, TemplateException,
301            JsonProcessingException, JsonMappingException {
302        // Try saved template, copy if not there (or to be updated)
303        Path templatePath = config.dataDir.resolve(SAVED_TEMPLATE);
304        if (!Files.isReadable(templatePath) || config.updateTemplate) {
305            // Get template
306            Path sourcePath = Paths.get(TEMPLATE_DIR).resolve(Optional
307                .ofNullable(config.template).orElse(DEFAULT_TEMPLATE));
308            Files.deleteIfExists(templatePath);
309            Files.copy(sourcePath, templatePath);
310        }
311
312        // Configure data model
313        var model = new HashMap<String, Object>();
314        model.put("dataDir", config.dataDir);
315        model.put("runtimeDir", config.runtimeDir);
316        model.put("firmwareRom", Optional.ofNullable(config.firmwareRom)
317            .map(Object::toString).orElse(null));
318        model.put("firmwareVars", Optional.ofNullable(config.firmwareVars)
319            .map(Object::toString).orElse(null));
320        model.put("vm", config.vm);
321        if (Optional.ofNullable(config.vm.display)
322            .map(d -> d.spice).map(s -> s.ticket).isPresent()) {
323            model.put("ticketPath", config.runtimeDir.resolve("ticket.txt"));
324        }
325
326        // Combine template and data and parse result
327        // (tempting, but no need to use a pipe here)
328        var fmTemplate = fmConfig.getTemplate(templatePath.toString());
329        StringWriter out = new StringWriter();
330        fmTemplate.process(model, out);
331        return yamlMapper.readValue(out.toString(), JsonNode.class);
332    }
333
334    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
335    private void updateConfiguration(Map<String, Object> conf) {
336        logger.fine(() -> "Updating configuration");
337        Optional.ofNullable((Map<String, Object>) conf.get("vm"))
338            .map(vm -> vm.get("currentRam")).map(Configuration::parseMemory)
339            .ifPresent(cr -> {
340                if (config.vm.currentRam != null
341                    && config.vm.currentRam.equals(cr)) {
342                    return;
343                }
344                synchronized (state) {
345                    config.vm.currentRam = cr;
346                    if (state.get() == State.RUNNING) {
347                        fire(new MonitorCommand(SET_CURRENT_RAM, cr));
348                    }
349                }
350            });
351        Optional.ofNullable((Map<String, Object>) conf.get("vm"))
352            .map(vm -> vm.get("currentCpus"))
353            .map(v -> v instanceof Number number ? number.intValue() : null)
354            .ifPresent(cpus -> {
355                if (config.vm.currentCpus == cpus) {
356                    return;
357                }
358                synchronized (state) {
359                    config.vm.currentCpus = cpus;
360                    if (state.get() == State.RUNNING) {
361                        fire(new MonitorCommand(SET_CURRENT_CPUS, cpus));
362                    }
363                }
364            });
365    }
366
367    /**
368     * Handle the start event.
369     *
370     * @param event the event
371     */
372    @Handler
373    public void onStart(Start event) {
374        try {
375            if (config == null) {
376                // Missing configuration, fail
377                fire(new Stop());
378                return;
379            }
380
381            // Store process id
382            try (var pidFile = Files.newBufferedWriter(
383                config.runtimeDir.resolve("runner.pid"))) {
384                pidFile.write(ProcessHandle.current().pid() + "\n");
385            }
386
387            // Files to watch for
388            Files.deleteIfExists(config.swtpmSocket);
389            fire(new WatchFile(config.swtpmSocket));
390
391            // Helper files
392            var ticket = Optional.ofNullable(config.vm.display)
393                .map(d -> d.spice).map(s -> s.ticket);
394            if (ticket.isPresent()) {
395                Files.write(config.runtimeDir.resolve("ticket.txt"),
396                    ticket.get().getBytes());
397            }
398        } catch (IOException e) {
399            logger.log(Level.SEVERE, e,
400                () -> "Cannot start runner: " + e.getMessage());
401            fire(new Stop());
402        }
403    }
404
405    /**
406     * Handle the started event.
407     *
408     * @param event the event
409     */
410    @Handler
411    public void onStarted(Started event) {
412        state.set(State.STARTING);
413        // Start first process
414        if (config.vm.useTpm && swtpmDefinition != null) {
415            startProcess(swtpmDefinition);
416            return;
417        }
418        startProcess(qemuDefinition);
419    }
420
421    private boolean startProcess(CommandDefinition toStart) {
422        logger.info(
423            () -> "Starting process: " + String.join(" ", toStart.command));
424        fire(new StartProcess(toStart.command)
425            .setAssociated(CommandDefinition.class, toStart));
426        return true;
427    }
428
429    /**
430     * Watch for the creation of the swtpm socket and start the
431     * qemu process if it has been created.
432     *
433     * @param event the event
434     */
435    @Handler
436    public void onFileChanged(FileChanged event) {
437        if (event.change() == Kind.CREATED
438            && event.path().equals(config.swtpmSocket)) {
439            // swtpm running, start qemu
440            startProcess(qemuDefinition);
441            return;
442        }
443    }
444
445    /**
446     * Associate required data with the process channel and register the
447     * channel in the context.
448     *
449     * @param event the event
450     * @param channel the channel
451     * @throws InterruptedException the interrupted exception
452     */
453    @Handler
454    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.SwitchStmtsShouldHaveDefault",
455        "PMD.TooFewBranchesForASwitchStatement" })
456    public void onProcessStarted(ProcessStarted event, ProcessChannel channel)
457            throws InterruptedException {
458        event.startEvent().associated(CommandDefinition.class)
459            .ifPresent(procDef -> {
460                channel.setAssociated(CommandDefinition.class, procDef);
461                try (var pidFile = Files.newBufferedWriter(
462                    config.runtimeDir.resolve(procDef.name + ".pid"))) {
463                    pidFile.write(channel.process().toHandle().pid() + "\n");
464                } catch (IOException e) {
465                    throw new UndeclaredThrowableException(e);
466                }
467
468                // Associate the channel with a line collector (one for
469                // each stream) for logging the process's output.
470                TypedIdKey.associate(channel, 1,
471                    new LineCollector().nativeCharset()
472                        .consumer(line -> logger
473                            .info(() -> procDef.name() + "(out): " + line)));
474                TypedIdKey.associate(channel, 2,
475                    new LineCollector().nativeCharset()
476                        .consumer(line -> logger
477                            .info(() -> procDef.name() + "(err): " + line)));
478            });
479    }
480
481    /**
482     * Forward output from the processes to to the log.
483     *
484     * @param event the event
485     * @param channel the channel
486     */
487    @Handler
488    public void onInput(Input<?> event, ProcessChannel channel) {
489        event.associated(FileDescriptor.class, Integer.class).ifPresent(
490            fd -> TypedIdKey.associated(channel, LineCollector.class, fd)
491                .ifPresent(lc -> lc.feed(event)));
492    }
493
494    /**
495     * On qemu monitor started.
496     *
497     * @param event the event
498     */
499    @Handler
500    public void onMonitorReady(MonitorReady event) {
501        synchronized (state) {
502            Optional.ofNullable(config.vm.currentRam).ifPresent(ram -> {
503                fire(new MonitorCommand(SET_CURRENT_RAM, ram));
504            });
505            Optional.ofNullable(config.vm.currentCpus).ifPresent(cpus -> {
506                fire(new MonitorCommand(SET_CURRENT_CPUS, cpus));
507            });
508        }
509    }
510
511    /**
512     * On monitor command completed.
513     *
514     * @param event the event
515     */
516    @Handler
517    public void onMonitorCommandCompleted(MonitorCommandCompleted event) {
518        if (state.get() != State.RUNNING
519            && event.command() == SET_CURRENT_CPUS) {
520            fire(new MonitorCommand(CONTINUE));
521            state.set(State.RUNNING);
522        }
523    }
524
525    /**
526     * On process exited.
527     *
528     * @param event the event
529     * @param channel the channel
530     */
531    @Handler
532    public void onProcessExited(ProcessExited event, ProcessChannel channel) {
533        channel.associated(CommandDefinition.class).ifPresent(procDef -> {
534            // No process(es) may exit during startup
535            if (state.get() == State.STARTING) {
536                logger.severe(() -> "Process " + procDef.name
537                    + " has exited with value " + event.exitValue()
538                    + " during startup.");
539                fire(new Stop());
540                return;
541            }
542            if (procDef.equals(qemuDefinition)
543                && state.get() == State.RUNNING) {
544                fire(new Stop());
545            }
546            logger.info(() -> "Process " + procDef.name
547                + " has exited with value " + event.exitValue());
548        });
549    }
550
551    /**
552     * On stop.
553     *
554     * @param event the event
555     */
556    @Handler(priority = 10_000)
557    public void onStop(Stop event) {
558        state.set(State.TERMINATING);
559    }
560
561    private void shutdown() {
562        if (state.get() != State.TERMINATING) {
563            fire(new Stop());
564        }
565        try {
566            Components.awaitExhaustion();
567        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
568            logger.log(Level.WARNING, e, () -> "Proper shutdown failed.");
569        }
570
571        Optional.ofNullable(config).map(c -> c.runtimeDir)
572            .ifPresent(runtimeDir -> {
573                try {
574                    Files.walk(runtimeDir).sorted(Comparator.reverseOrder())
575                        .map(Path::toFile).forEach(File::delete);
576                } catch (IOException e) {
577                    logger.warning(() -> String.format(
578                        "Cannot delete runtime directory \"%s\".",
579                        runtimeDir));
580                }
581            });
582    }
583
584    static {
585        try {
586            InputStream props;
587            var path = FsdUtils.findConfigFile(Runner.APP_NAME,
588                "logging.properties");
589            if (path.isPresent()) {
590                props = Files.newInputStream(path.get());
591            } else {
592                props = Runner.class.getResourceAsStream("logging.properties");
593            }
594            LogManager.getLogManager().readConfiguration(props);
595        } catch (IOException e) {
596            e.printStackTrace();
597        }
598    }
599
600    /**
601     * The main method.
602     *
603     * @param args the command
604     */
605    public static void main(String[] args) {
606        // The Runner is the root component
607        try {
608            CommandLineParser parser = new DefaultParser();
609            // parse the command line arguments
610            final Options options = new Options();
611            options.addOption(new Option("c", "config", true, "The configu"
612                + "ration file (defaults to /etc/opt/vmrunner/config.yaml)."));
613            CommandLine cmd = parser.parse(options, args);
614            var app = new Runner(cmd);
615
616            // Prepare Stop
617            Runtime.getRuntime().addShutdownHook(new Thread(() -> {
618                app.shutdown();
619            }));
620
621            // Start the application
622            Components.start(app);
623        } catch (IOException | InterruptedException
624                | org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException e) {
625            Logger.getLogger(Runner.class.getName()).log(Level.SEVERE, e,
626                () -> "Failed to start runner: " + e.getMessage());
627        }
628    }
629}
